授業方法:
This course is conducted in lecture format. Please note the following:
1. For all students: assignments will be posted on LUNA daily, along with important announcements about the course, and so it is critical that students log in to LUNA regularly during this course.
2. Some lectures may be posted online in lieu of face to face lectures (the URL will be provided on LUNA) -- information about any lecture to be posted online instead of face to face will be announced on LUNA.

第1回:
Detailed Syllabus Provided on LUNA on the First Day of Class
In-class work only (no reading assignment or homework due)

This course has a heavy weekly reading load, and reading assignments must be completed before coming to class each week. There are also several writing assignments that must completed outside of class. Plagiarism or turning in assignments written by generative software (e.g. Chat GPT) will result in an F for the course.

評価.教科書Required texts0:
2. de Soete, Francois. “The Limits of Interpretation and Thucydides: An Analysis of Realist Themes in the History of the Peloponnesian War,” The Journal of International Studies 13 (2024): 33-47.
https://kwansei.repo.nii.ac.jp/records/2000246

3. de Soete, Francois, "The Trump Presidency, the Coronavirus, and the New America: Can the U.S. Military Still Preserve the Status Quo in East Asia?" (The Journal of International Studies, 2021) - Available on this course's LUNA page.
https://kwansei.repo.nii.ac.jp/records/29325

4. de Soete, Francois, "Trump, Biden, and U.S. Foreign Policy: Analyzing the Role of the Modern Presidency on America's Standing in the World" (The Journal of International Studies, 2022) - Available on this course's LUNA page.
https://kwansei.repo.nii.ac.jp/records/30079
評価.参考文献・資料Reference books0: Books for this course will be held on reserve at the library. The book titles will be provided in the detailed syllabus given to students on the first day of class.
評価.学位授与の方針との関連Relationship to Diploma Polic:
各授業科目は、各学部・研究科の定めるディプロマ・ポリシー（DP）・カリキュラム・ポリシー（CP）に基づき、カリキュラム上に配置されています。
DP・CPを意識して本授業科目の学修を進めることで、各学部・研究科の期待する能力が養成されます。
各学部・研究科のDP、CPや教育課程表（授業科目一覧等）は、下記リンクこちらに掲載していますので学修計画の参考にしてください。
https://kwic.kwansei.ac.jp/cabinet/reference?typeCd=0&cabinetId=557&directLink=1
※kwicへのリンクとなります（在学生のみ閲覧可）
